item.title: DEF CON n00b guide
item.description: DEF CON Guide DEF CON Belonging (Sometimes You Feel Like a Nut. Sometimes You Don’t.) Getting Involved and Making New Hacker Friends Be Inclusive (“Pac Man” Theory) Transportation Airport Tips/Tricks International Hackers Hotels Hotel Room Hax Work Trip? “Doing The Con” Badges LineCon DEF CON Program Navigating the Con Swag/Vendor Area Tracks/Talks RoomCon DC101 Villages Workshops Contests and Events CFP SkyTalks Parties Con Life 3-2-1 Rule Handles Goons (Those Cool People in Red, Often Confused with Deadpool) $$$$ aka MONEY Pack Light, Have Comfortable Shoes Daily Loadout Medical Supplies/Medicine Badge Life/Indie Badges Con Flu Bathrooms Shenanigans Collectible/Swag Challenge Coins Staying Informed Hacker Tracker App Twitter Slack Reddit Lonely Hackers Club Security/Privacy Photos/Videos Device Security/Privacy Burner Devices Room Security/Privacy Personal Security/Safety Bring a Battle Buddy Being Stupid?

item.title: books
item.description: So you wanna get your learn on huh? Below is intended to be a growing list of books to help you level up those hacker skills The Knowledgebase Hacking the Art of exploitation Practical Malware Analysis Practical Binary Analysis Serious Cryptography PoC or GTFO PoC or GTFO Volume 2 Social Engineering: The Art of Human Hacking Open Source intelligence Techniques Black Hat Python
